org.openjdk.tools.doclint

类 DocLint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openjdk.tools.doclint.DocLint
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Plugin

    public class DocLint
extends Object
implements Plugin
    Multi-function entry point for the doc check utility. This class can be invoked in the following ways:
    • From the command line
    • From javac, as a plugin
    • Directly, via a simple API

    This is NOT part of any supported API. If you write code that depends on this, you do so at your own risk. This code and its internal interfaces are subject to change or deletion without notice.

      • main

      • run

        public void run(String... args)
         throws DocLint.BadArgs,
                IOException
        Simple API entry point.
        参数:
        args - Options and operands for doclint
        抛出:
        DocLint.BadArgs - if an error is detected in any args
        IOException - if there are problems with any of the file arguments

      • run

                String... args)
         throws DocLint.BadArgs,

        从接口复制的说明: Plugin

        参数:

        args - Arguments, if any, for the plug-in
